About_meta_description: The footwork generator allows dancers to improve their dancing skills using rhythmic variation of steps. Contact form
About_1: The idea of generator was based on the rythm course by Marina Ananova, a lindy hop teacher.
About_2: The generator is written to help lindy hop dancers (and possibly other styles dancers) to improve their dancing skills by varying the basic steps. Also we offer several exercises and some theory
About_3: If you have suggestions, comments, write on
About_5: If you want to support the project or to thank the author, you can
About_6: Don't forget to tell your friends! There are share buttons at the bottom of the page
